Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Annotation|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
Annotation:(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Annotation#AnnotationFHIR R5 ComplexType `Annotation` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions. Element `Annotation` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Annotation`, but has no comparisons.
Annotation.author[x] (author[x]):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Annotation#Annotation.author[x]Note that the target element context `Annotation.author[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Annotation`. Element `Annotation.author[x]` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Annotation.author[x]`, but has no comparisons. Note that the target element context `Annotation.author[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Annotation`.
Annotation.time (time):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Annotation#Annotation.timeElement `Annotation.time` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Annotation.time`, but has no comparisons.
Annotation.text (text):(equivalent)http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Annotation#Annotation.textElement `Annotation.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Annotation.text`, but has no comparisons.

name: ConceptMapR5AnnotationElementsForR4Annotation
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 ComplexType `Annotation` is representable via FHIR R4 extensions.
Element `Annotation` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Annotation`, but has no comparisons.

Note that the target element context `Annotation.author[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Annotation`.
Element `Annotation.author[x]` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Annotation.author[x]`, but has no comparisons.
Note that the target element context `Annotation.author[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `Annotation`.
Element `Annotation.time` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Annotation.time`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Annotation.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Annotation.text`, but has no comparisons.
